definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ex 3:2 a thorny bush, perh. black-berry bush (cf. Löw:No. 219; rubus fruticosus Linn.; Aram. [[סַנְיׇא]], sanyo0 thorn-bush, As. sinû, Meissner:ZA vi. 293 blackberry bush (M. thinks Aram. ´[[ס]] loan-word from this); Ar. sanan0 senna, Lane:1449);—abs. ´[[ס]] Ex 3:2, Ex 3:2, Ex 3:4, [[מְנֶ֑ה]] v:Ex 3:2, v:Ex 3:3 (all E) De 33:16 (akin to E).
